verses.verse: (Calm Trust in Yahweh) (A song of ascents. Of David.) My heart is not haughty nor my eyes arrogant. And I do not concern myself with things too great and difficult for me.
Rather I have soothed and quieted my soul, like a weaned child with its mother, like the weaned child is my soul with me.
O Israel, hope in Yahweh from now until forever.
